level.heading: ASSIGNMENT OF PETITION; SCHEDULING OF HEARING (ยง 9-2007)

level.text: An incomplete or improperly filed petition shall be returned to the petitioner with an explanation of the reason for its return.
Each complete and properly filed petition shall be assigned to a Panel.
After assignment of a petition to a Panel, the Commission Chairperson shall schedule a hearing date.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 24, 30 (January 2, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 9888 (July 5, 2013).
